001/*

004 */
005
006package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.selection;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
009import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.Matching;
010import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.control.catalog.IControl;
011import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.control.profile.IProfileSelectControlById;
012import gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.profile.resolver.ProfileResolutionEvaluationException;
013
014import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
015import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
016import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
017
018import java.util.Collections;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Objects;
021import java.util.Set;
022import java.util.regex.Pattern;
023import java.util.stream.Collectors;
024
025import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
026
027public class DefaultControlSelectionFilter implements IControlSelectionFilter {
028  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(DefaultControlSelectionFilter.class);
029
030  @NonNull
031  private final List<Selection> selections;
032
033  /**
034   * Construct a new selection filter based on the provided list of select
035   * criteria.
036   *
037   * @param selections
038   *          a list of select criteria
039   */
040  @SuppressWarnings("null")
041  public DefaultControlSelectionFilter(@NonNull List<? extends IProfileSelectControlById> selections) {
042    this.selections = selections.stream()
043        // ignore null entries
044        .filter(Objects::nonNull)
045        // create a selection object for the selection
046        .map(Selection::new)
047        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
048  }
049
050  @NonNull
051  @Override
052  public Pair<Boolean, Boolean> apply(IControl control) {
053    String id = control.getId();
054    if (id == null) {
055      throw new ProfileResolutionEvaluationException("control is missing an identifier");
056    }
057    return match(id);
058  }
059
060  /**
061   * Checks if the provided control identifier matches the criteria defined by
062   * this object.
063   *
064   * @param id
065   *          the control identifier to match
066   * @return a {@link Pair} whose first member is {@code true} for a match or
067   *         {@code false} otherwise, and whose second member is {@code true} if
068   *         the match applies to any child controls or {@code false} otherwise
069   */
070  @SuppressWarnings("null")
071  @NonNull
072  protected Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(String id) {
073    return selections.parallelStream()
074        .map(selection -> selection.match(id))
075        // filter out non-matches
076        .filter(Pair::getLeft)
077        // aggregate matches
078        .reduce((first, second) -> {
079          Pair<Boolean, Boolean> result;
080          if (first.getLeft() || second.getLeft()) {
081            // at least one matches
082            boolean withChild = first.getLeft() && first.getRight() || second.getLeft() && second.getRight();
083            result = Pair.of(true, withChild);
084          } else {
085            result = NON_MATCH;
086          }
087          return result;
088        })
089        .orElse(NON_MATCH);
090  }
091
092  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ImplicitSwitchFallThrough")
093  private static Pattern toPattern(@NonNull Matching matching) {
094    String pattern = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(matching.getPattern());
095    String regex = pattern.chars().boxed().map(ch -> (char) ch.intValue()).map(ch -> {
096
097      String value;
098      switch (ch) {
099      case '*':
100        value = ".*";
101        break;
102      case '?':
103        value = ".";
104        break;
105      case '.':
106      case '+':
107      case '\\':
108      case '[':
109      case ']':
110      case '{':
111      case '}':
112      case '(':
113      case ')':
114      case '^':
115      case '$':
116        value = "\\" + ch;
117        break;
118      default:
119        value = String.valueOf(ch);
120      }
121      return value;
122    }).collect(Collectors.joining("", "^", "$"));
123
124    if (LOGGER.isTraceEnabled()) {
125      LOGGER.atTrace().log("regex: {}", regex);
126    }
127    return Pattern.compile(regex);
128  }
129
130  private static class Selection {
131
132    private final boolean withChildControls;
133    private final Set<String> identifiers;
134    private final List<Pattern> patterns;
135
136    public Selection(IProfileSelectControlById selection) {
137      // process with-child-controls
138      // default is "no"
139      this.withChildControls = "yes".equals(selection.getWithChildControls());
140
141      // process with-ids
142      List<String> ids = selection.getWithIds();
143      if (ids == null) {
144        ids = Collections.emptyList();
145      }
146      this.identifiers = ids.stream()
147          .filter(Objects::nonNull)
148          .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableSet());
149
150      // process with-ids
151      List<Matching> matching = selection.getMatching();
152      if (matching == null) {
153        matching = Collections.emptyList();
154      }
155      this.patterns = matching.stream()
156          .filter(Objects::nonNull)
157          .map(DefaultControlSelectionFilter::toPattern)
158          .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList());
159    }
160
161    public boolean isWithChildControls() {
162      return withChildControls;
163    }
164
165    @NonNull
166    protected Pair<Boolean, Boolean> match(String id) {
167      // first check for direct match
168      boolean result = identifiers.stream().anyMatch(controlIdentifier -> controlIdentifier.equals(id));
169      if (!result) {
170        // next check for pattern match
171        result = patterns.stream().anyMatch(pattern -> pattern.asMatchPredicate().test(id));
172      }
173      return ObjectUtils.notNull(Pair.of(result, isWithChildControls()));
174    }
175  }
176}
